thread.title: VIRGINIA NOVAK
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by VIRGINIA NOVAK

author: VIRGINIA NOVAK
title: VIRGINIA NOVAK
text: My husband & son really enjoy these since they're diabetic & shouldn't have the regular kind. These are just as delicious & we're so glad to be able to get them. They come in a good size with good packing & good price so definitely something to get whenever wanting this treat.
